description:
Tommy had dropped quite a few hints that he is pretty open sexually.
He mentioned on more than one occasion that he likes to go to the skate park, especially during the hot Texas summer, due to the general lack of shirts and other articles of clothing, like underwear!
"I've never fucked another dude," he told me. "But I'd love to try..."
And so we hooked him up with Trent, who loved having Tommy's big Texas cock up his ass!
My favorite part of this video is the end... Tommy fucks Trent hard and strokes Trent's cock until he blows!
And then... Trent licks his own cum off of Tommy's fingers! Hot!
title: Tommy & Trent
